name: Santa Fun Run Free
description: Christmas holidays are just around the corner, the icy bridge has been broken down and what could be worse than the loss of gifts for kids. The only way to save the holiday spirit is to help Santa Claus jump over the river and collect fallen gifts. Santa Fun Run is a fun and exciting infinite running game in which you have to help Santa safely cross over the broken bridge by providing him a slider. Collect as many gifts as possible. The more fallen gifts you pick up, the easier your mission becomes. Make sure that there are no presents left behind! The feeling of excitement and fast reaction will not let you leave the game. Christmas music, snowy weather, and changing backgrounds will keep you sticky all day. Have great holidays!!!
